summary: A standalone female follower with the intention to look Indian. For the lore-mongers it can also be seen as a Redguard follower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]A female follower with the intention to look Indian. For the lore-mongers out there, it can also be seen as a Redguard character preset. I used this preset for my personal female playthroughs and have been using and perfecting it for more than a year now. This follower is based on an older version of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78288/?]preset mod[/url].

This follower was made by mod author [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/32238265/?]SillyKawaii[/url] on my request. I have been editing this follower and added custom , since I got some more experience now by making my male follower mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78326/?]Avinash[/url]

The meaning of the name “Priya” is “Beloved One”. It's used in Hindi speaking countries. It's origins are found in the Sanskrit language. [url=http://www.behindthename.com/name/priya]Source[/url]


[b][color=#cccccc]Mods used to make her standalone[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url]

You could try using tattoos and other haircuts etc. Feedback is always welcome.
